title: Was Bill Maher, Megan Kelly Argie Kidds, not to be burdened with race issues?
subtitle: "It bothers me so much that I have to be on this side of this case because I've always been a civil rights defender," said Maher Kelly. "Don't make me Tucker Carlson" added.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Bill Maher and Megan Kelly argue that eight- and nine-year-olds shouldn't be burdened with race problems.
